com.paymill.services
Class ChecksumService

java.lang.Object
  com.paymill.services.ChecksumService

public class ChecksumService
extends Object

The ChecksumService is used to create PAYMILL Checksums. In order to create client-side transactions, e.g. PayPal.

Since:
5.1.0
Author:
Vassil Nikolov

Method Detail

createChecksumForPaypal

public Checksum createChecksumForPaypal(Integer amount,
                                        String currency,
                                        String returnUrl,
                                        String cancelUrl)
Created a Checksum of Checksum.Type with amount in the given currency.

Parameters:
amount - Amount (in cents) which will be charged.
currency - ISO 4217 formatted currency code.
returnUrl - URL to redirect customers to after checkout has completed.
cancelUrl - URL to redirect customers to after they have canceled the checkout. As a result, there will be no transaction.
Returns:
Checksum object.

createChecksumForPaypalWithFee

public Checksum createChecksumForPaypalWithFee(Integer amount,
                                               String currency,
                                               String returnUrl,
                                               String cancelUrl,
                                               Fee fee,
                                               String appId)
Created a Checksum of Checksum.Type with amount in the given currency.

Parameters:
amount - Amount (in cents) which will be charged.
currency - ISO 4217 formatted currency code.
returnUrl - URL to redirect customers to after checkout has completed.
cancelUrl - URL to redirect customers to after they have canceled the checkout. As a result, there will be no transaction.
fee - A Fee.
appId - App (ID) that created this refund or null if created by yourself.
Returns:
Checksum object.

createChecksumForPaypalWithDescription

public Checksum createChecksumForPaypalWithDescription(Integer amount,
                                                       String currency,
                                                       String returnUrl,
                                                       String cancelUrl,
                                                       String description)
Created a Checksum of Checksum.Type with amount in the given currency.

Parameters:
amount - Amount (in cents) which will be charged.
currency - ISO 4217 formatted currency code.
returnUrl - URL to redirect customers to after checkout has completed.
cancelUrl - URL to redirect customers to after they have canceled the checkout. As a result, there will be no transaction.
description - A short description for the transaction.
Returns:
Checksum object.

createChecksumForPaypalWithFeeAndDescription

public Checksum createChecksumForPaypalWithFeeAndDescription(Integer amount,
                                                             String currency,
                                                             String returnUrl,
                                                             String cancelUrl,
                                                             Fee fee,
                                                             String description,
                                                             String appId)
Created a Checksum of Checksum.Type with amount in the given currency.

Parameters:
amount - Amount (in cents) which will be charged.
currency - ISO 4217 formatted currency code.
returnUrl - URL to redirect customers to after checkout has completed.
cancelUrl - URL to redirect customers to after they have canceled the checkout. As a result, there will be no transaction.
fee - A Fee.
description - A short description for the transaction.
appId - App (ID) that created this refund or null if created by yourself.
Returns:
Checksum object.

createChecksumForPaypalWithItemsAndAddress

public Checksum createChecksumForPaypalWithItemsAndAddress(Integer amount,
                                                           String currency,
                                                           String returnUrl,
                                                           String cancelUrl,
                                                           String description,
                                                           List<ShoppingCartItem> items,
                                                           Address shipping,
                                                           Address billing)
Created a Checksum of Checksum.Type with amount in the given currency.

Parameters:
amount - Amount (in cents) which will be charged.
currency - ISO 4217 formatted currency code.
returnUrl - URL to redirect customers to after checkout has completed.
cancelUrl - URL to redirect customers to after they have canceled the checkout. As a result, there will be no transaction.
description - A short description for the transaction or null.
items - List of ShoppingCartItems
billing - Billing Address for this transaction.
shipping - Shipping Address for this transaction.
Returns:
Checksum object.
